00035         class LIBDECL TuioBlob: public TuioContainer {
00036                 
00037         protected:
00041                 int blob_id;
00045                 float angle;
00049                 float width;
00053                 float height;
00057                 float area;
00061                 float rotation_speed;
00065                 float rotation_accel;
00066                 
00067         public:
00068                 using TuioContainer::update;
00069                 
00083                 TuioBlob (TuioTime ttime, long si, int bi, float xp, float yp, float a, float w, float h, float f):TuioContainer(ttime, si, xp, yp) {
00084                         blob_id = bi;
00085                         angle = a;
00086                         width = w;
00087                         height = h;
00088                         area = f;
00089                         rotation_speed = 0.0f;
00090                         rotation_accel = 0.0f;
00091                 };
00092 
00105                 TuioBlob (long si, int bi, float xp, float yp, float a, float  w, float h, float f):TuioContainer(si, xp, yp) {
00106                         blob_id = bi;
00107                         angle = a;
00108                         width = w;
00109                         height = h; 
00110                         area = f;
00111                         rotation_speed = 0.0f;
00112                         rotation_accel = 0.0f;
00113                 };
00114                 
00121                 TuioBlob (TuioBlob *tblb):TuioContainer(tblb) {
00122                         blob_id = tblb->getBlobID();
00123                         angle = tblb->getAngle();
00124                         width = tblb->getWidth();
00125                         height = tblb->getHeight();
00126                         area = tblb->getArea();
00127                         rotation_speed = 0.0f;
00128                         rotation_accel = 0.0f;
00129                 };
00130                 
00134                 ~TuioBlob() {};
00135 
00140                 int getBlobID() const{
00141                         return blob_id;
00142                 };
00143                 
00162                 void update (TuioTime ttime, float xp, float yp, float a, float w, float h, float f, float xs, float ys, float rs, float ma, float ra) {
00163                         TuioContainer::update(ttime,xp,yp,xs,ys,ma);
00164                         angle = a;
00165                         width = w;
00166                         height = h;
00167                         area = f;
00168                         rotation_speed = rs;
00169                         rotation_accel = ra;
00170                         if ((rotation_accel!=0) && (state==TUIO_STOPPED)) state = TUIO_ROTATING;
00171                 };
00172 
00190                 void update (float xp, float yp, float a, float w, float h, float f, float xs, float ys, float rs, float ma, float ra) {
00191                         TuioContainer::update(xp,yp,xs,ys,ma);
00192                         angle = a;
00193                         width = w;
00194                         height = h;
00195                         area = f;
00196                         rotation_speed = rs;
00197                         rotation_accel = ra;
00198                         if ((rotation_accel!=0) && (state==TUIO_STOPPED)) state = TUIO_ROTATING;
00199                 };
00200                 
00214                 void update (TuioTime ttime, float xp, float yp, float a, float w, float h, float f) {
00215                         TuioPoint lastPoint = path.back();
00216                         TuioContainer::update(ttime,xp,yp);
00217                         
00218                         TuioTime diffTime = currentTime - lastPoint.getTuioTime();
00219                         float dt = diffTime.getTotalMilliseconds()/1000.0f;
00220                         float last_angle = angle;
00221                         float last_rotation_speed = rotation_speed;
00222                         angle = a;
00223                         
00224                         double da = (angle-last_angle)/(2*M_PI);
00225                         if (da > 0.75f) da-=1.0f;
00226                         else if (da < -0.75f) da+=1.0f;
00227 
00228                         width = w;
00229                         height = h;
00230                         area = f;
00231                         
00232                         rotation_speed = (float)da/dt;
00233                         rotation_accel =  (rotation_speed - last_rotation_speed)/dt;
00234                 
00235                         if ((rotation_accel!=0) && (state==TUIO_STOPPED)) state = TUIO_ROTATING;
00236                 };
00237 
00242                 void stop (TuioTime ttime) {
00243                         update(ttime,xpos,ypos,width,height,angle);
00244                 };
00245                 
00253                 void update (TuioBlob *tblb) {
00254                         TuioContainer::update(tblb);
00255                         angle = tblb->getAngle();
00256                         width = tblb->getWidth();
00257                         height = tblb->getHeight();
00258                         area = tblb->getArea();
00259                         rotation_speed = tblb->getRotationSpeed();
00260                         rotation_accel = tblb->getRotationAccel();
00261                         if ((rotation_accel!=0) && (state==TUIO_STOPPED)) state = TUIO_ROTATING;
00262                 };
00263                 
00268                 float getWidth() const{ 
00269                         return width;
00270                 };
00271 
00276                 float getHeight() const{ 
00277                         return height;
00278                 };
00279 
00284                 int getScreenWidth(int w) const{ 
00285                         return (int)(w*width);
00286                 };
00287                 
00292                 int getScreenHeight(int h) const{ 
00293                         return (int)(h*height);
00294                 };
00295                 
00300                 float getArea() const{ 
00301                         return area;
00302                 };
00303                 
00308                 float getAngle() const{
00309                         return angle;
00310                 };
00311                 
00316                 float getAngleDegrees() const{ 
00317                         return (float)(angle/M_PI*180);
00318                 };
00319                 
00324                 float getRotationSpeed() const{ 
00325                         return rotation_speed;
00326                 };
00327                 
00332                 float getRotationAccel() const{
00333                         return rotation_accel;
00334                 };
00335 
00340                 virtual bool isMoving() const{ 
00341                         if ((state==TUIO_ACCELERATING) || (state==TUIO_DECELERATING) || (state==TUIO_ROTATING)) return true;
00342                         else return false;
00343                 };
00344         };
